segments.text: I would like to buy a black suit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any special brand in your mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I never wear suit in my everyday life . I just want one to take part in my sister ’ s wedding ceremony .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Have a look at this one . It ’ s very cheap because it ’ s not very durable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but it looks good . Let me try it on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , the mirror is over there .
segments.speaker: S2
